name: WATERSUB
description:
The submarine you were travelling in got damaged and water is everywhere, so you must survive. With everything you see on the screen you have to try to escape, but once the water reaches you, your end will come!

This game was developed in 72 hours for the Winter Jam under the restriction "The End Is Near", by Team Onda Dinamita, a Latin American team of amazing girls!

Character Design and animation - Aura Rodriguez (Auroras)

Game Design and Programming - Giannina Tartaglia (Elithne)

Graphic Design and UI - Belén Edrira (Chise)

Music and SFXs - Paula Quadrelli (Pau)

Background and assets - Daniela González (Dayori) 

Web version added, but PC version is encouraged!
